mapper.select:
SELECT us.groupon_id, us.groupon_id AS validate_id, us.product_id, op.product_name, op.product_img, op.spec_config, op.spec_custom, op.sale_price, us.groupon_price, us.groupon_name, us.start_time, us.end_time, us.expire_time, us.groupon_number, us.max_limit, us.virtual_groupon, us.head_discount, us.state, us.create_time, us.update_time, us.shop_id FROM weiit_ump_groupon us, weiit_product op WHERE us.product_id = op.product_id AND us.groupon_id = #{validate_id}
and us.shop_id=#{shop_id}
mapper.insert: insert into weiit_ump_groupon (product_id, groupon_price, groupon_name, start_time, end_time, expire_time, max_limit, groupon_number, virtual_groupon, head_discount, state, create_time, update_time, shop_id) values (#{product_id}, #{groupon_price}, #{groupon_name}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{expire_time}, #{max_limit}, #{groupon_number}, #{virtual_groupon}, #{head_discount}, #{state}, now(), now(), #{shop_id})

insert into weiit_ump_groupon_item (product_id, groupon_id, item_id, groupon_price, sale_price, spec_custom, create_time, update_time) values (#{product_id}, #{groupon_id}, #{item_id}, #{groupon_price}, #{sale_price}, #{spec_custom}, now(), now())
